Protocols/Manager.html#/c:@M@APExtension.name: start()
Protocols/Manager.html#/c:@M@APExtension.abstract: Start manager. Usually on app start or user login.

Protocols/Manager.html#/c:@M@APExtension.name: reset()
Protocols/Manager.html#/c:@M@APExtension.abstract: Reset manager state. Common patter is to clean userDefaults/database manager records and reassign shared variable. Usually on user logout.

Protocols/Configurable.html#/s:12APExten.name: configure(viewModel:)
Protocols/Configurable.html#/s:12APExten.abstract: Pass view model to view so it can configure itself.

Protocols/TableViewCellInformation.html.name: TableViewCellInformation

Protocols/TableViewConfigurableCellInfor.name: TableViewConfigurableCellInformation
Protocols/TableViewConfigurableCellInfor.abstract: Minimum information required to display cell in table view

Protocols/Configurable.html.name: Configurable
Protocols/Configurable.html.abstract: Usually views might conform to this protocol so it’s possible to pass view model without typecasting.

Protocols/Describable.html.name: Describable
Protocols/Describable.html.abstract: Helps to print all object fields and values

Protocols/InstantiatableFromXib.html.name: InstantiatableFromXib
Protocols/InstantiatableFromXib.html.abstract: Helps to instantiate object from xib file.

Protocols/InstantiatableFromStoryboard.h.name: InstantiatableFromStoryboard
Protocols/InstantiatableFromStoryboard.h.abstract: Helps to instantiate object from storyboard file.

Protocols/InstantiatableContentView.html.name: InstantiatableContentView
Protocols/InstantiatableContentView.html.abstract: Helps to instantiate content view from storyboard file.

Protocols/Manager.html.name: Manager
Protocols/Manager.html.abstract: Simplifies Managers start and reset routine. All managers could be then started/reseted on apropriate point in app, e.g. on user login/logout.

Protocols/SetupOnce.html.name: SetupOnce
Protocols/SetupOnce.html.abstract: Simplifies work with classes that need some routine to be performed once on app load.

Protocols/ViewControllerExtendedStates.h.name: ViewControllerExtendedStates
Protocols/ViewControllerExtendedStates.h.abstract: You can conform to that protocol in your view controller to get .viewDidAttach() and .viewStateDidChange() calls

Functions.html#/s:12APExtensions22g_send.abstract: Sends email using mailto: url scheme. Won’t do anything if URL can not be composed.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: today

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Get tomorrow’s day start date. Uses user’s time zone.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: components

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: previousWorkDay

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: nextWorkDay
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns beginning of the next work day excluding today. It just exludes weekends. Does not exclude holidays.
